README.p: This extension defines a product-store node which can be used to manage unlimited projects, using nested categories. A check-out and search function is available.

The shopping cart allows for adding of any product item to a centralized shopping cart that is displayed to the user after adding an item. Item quantities can be updated in bulk, with invalid entries handled gracefully.
README.h4: Note: only positive integers are allowed for quantities.
